backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, logo storage, and CRUD operations for horror stories with access control for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark horror-themed color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public pages and admin pages including story creation and logo management.
frontend/src/components/AdSlotPlaceholde: UI placeholder component showing a styled ad slot card with icon and labels.
frontend/src/components/AffiliateLinksPl: UI placeholder card displaying example affiliate book entries with icons and buttons.
Comments UI allowing authenticated users to post comments and showing comment lists with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, identity actions, and search handling.
Button component that toggles night mode using the night mode hook.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Search input form with submit and clear actions for querying stories.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Main site layout including header, routed content area, and footer with credits.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Card UI for displaying a story preview with category, date, excerpt, and link to full story.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useComments.ts: Hooks for fetching and adding story comments via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogo.ts: Hooks for retrieving, uploading, and deleting the site logo plus helper to create a URL for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useNightMode.ts: LocalStorage-backed hook to read and toggle night mode state.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Hooks for querying and mutating story data including latest, by category, search, and creation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, horror-themed color variables, fonts, scrollbar styling, and prose formatting.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Defines story category metadata and helper functions for lookup and labeling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogoPage.tsx: Admin page for uploading, previewing, and deleting a site logo with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminStoryNewPage.tsx: Admin form for creating new stories with validation, category selection, and post-submit navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays stories for a specific category with loading states and fallback UI.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage hero section and latest stories grid with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Provides search input and renders matching stories with loading and empty result states.
frontend/src/pages/StoryPage.tsx: Displays a full story with category, date, night mode, ads, affiliate links, and comments, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, with hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project's dark themed UI.
project_state.json: Stores the project's current state, features, issues, and metadata for the horror storytelling website.
